scripts.i: cd client && npm i && cd .. && npm i
scripts.client: cd client && concurrently "npx react-native start" "npx react-native run-android"
scripts.server-hot: docker-compose up -d && cd Server.Api && dotnet watch run
scripts.migrations: cd Server.Api && dotnet ef database update 0 && dotnet ef migrations remove && dotnet ef migrations add Initial && dotnet ef database update && cd ..
scripts.restore: cd Server.Api && dotnet restore && cd .. && cd Server.UnitTests && dotnet restore
scripts.upgrade: npm run i && npm run restore && npm run migrations
